thread.title: Pastor ties up and rapes teen he picked up outside her school
thread.title_full: Pastor ties up and rapes teen he picked up outside her school

title: Pastor ties up and rapes teen he picked up outside her school
text:
Tennessee pastor ties up and rapes teen he picked up outside her school Pastor ties up and rapes teen he picked up outside her school THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Mike Ulmer, 53, arrested for tying up and raping an 18-year-old student in Henderson, Tennessee in February of 2017. THE ASSOCIATED PRESS  52 AM 
HENDERSON, Tenn. â€” Police say a teacher's assistant and preacher tied up and raped an 18-year-old student inside his western Tennessee home. 
Citing court documents, news outlets report that 53-year-old Mike Ulmer was charged last week with two counts of rape and one count of sexual assault. 
Ulmer is the pastor of Bethlehem Baptist Church in Henderson. 
Authorities say Ulmer picked the Chester County High School student up from school Feb. 16 and brought her to his home, which she had cleaned in the past. 
The teenager told investigators Ulmer tied her hands together inside his office and sexually assaulted her. 
Chester County Director of Schools Troy Kilzer says Ulmer, who worked with the in-school suspension program, has been suspended without pay. 
Ulmer pleaded not guilty Tuesday and was released on bond. Join the Conversation:
